name: AMI
description:
An angel is banished to another realm and his only hope of regaining his former powers is by receiving help from a demon.

--

This is my first rpgmaker game! I made it for fun to get a feel for the program. This project was started around August.

-30 min - hour

-2 endings

-Some mild gore in the bad endings

Let me know if there are any bugs or spelling mistakes. There isn't any music for the cutscenes since I couldn't find anything I liked. 

--
